Job Description: Assignment description     To assist with software development activities in the Lule site following the Scrum/Agile working process.    Common work tasks:     Develop new features together with the UX Lead and product owner     Correct defects in the product    Participate in daily standups    Refactor code    Requirements:     Fluent in English    C#, GIT, .NET Core.    Ability to work together or alone with development tasks     Important competence/experience:     Strong sense of responsibility    Knowledge of Clean architecture or other similar architectures.    Knowledge and understanding in Amazon web services.    MQTT, SQL Server, Winforms.
